text:
@WhiteHouse Dr. Augustine again here on 5/8/20 @
3:00 pm PDST just off the phone with the county board of supervisors trying to get attention about my cure for the Coronavirus when this came in about the people in Peru trying to get home but I'm still being ignored by the White House
